Rulings.Base:
1. Special Summoning this card with its effect starts a Chain.
2. You cannot Special Summon this card from your hand during the Damage Step.
3. If you have more than 1 copy of this card in your hand when a Level 4 or lower monster is Special Summoned, you can only Special Summon 1 of them.
4. If both players have a "T.G. Warwolf" they want to Special Summon, the effects form a Chain. The turn player's "T.G. Warwolf" effect is Chain Link 1.

PSCT.Base: When a Level 4 or lower monster(s) is Special Summoned (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was destroyed on the field and sent there this turn: You can add 1 "T.G." monster from your Deck to your hand, except "T.G. Warwolf".
